127030001.text: You have completed the new round of the Hexanexus

127030002.text: I guess not even our internal testers understood the Hexanexus as much as you did

127030003.text: To be frank, the new Hexanexus garnered equal amounts of positive and negative attention

127030004.text: One of the main issues was "The devices are too abrupt and lack reasonable marketing"

127030005.text: It is pretty abrupt. Expecting people to just play with something on the side of the street is quite a reach

127030006.text: You're right, but we didn't really have a choice

127030007.text: Your Hexanexus devices can't really be marketed

127030008.text: Hey, let's not speak in absolutes. We can always try

127030009.text: It's easy. Even I can do it for you

127030010.text: Oh, we wouldn't want to trouble you like this. We just wanted to hear the opinion of our invested users

127030011.text: Our "storyteller" wants to give the Hexanexus an overarching theme in the marketing campaign. We have three general directions so far: Supernatural, cataclysmic, and anthropomorphic. Which one do you like best?

127030012.text: Taking immersion into account, maybe you can try the supernatural route

127030013.text: A mundane life in which extraordinary dangers lurk. Investigate the Hexanexus and explore the supernatural occurrences of the Xianzhou Luofu... Someone must walk toward the night in order to protect the dawn

127030014.text: I think that's a good one

127030015.text: Considering your product's vast worldview, maybe try a cataclysmic theme

127030016.text: In a certain planet, the Antimatter Legion has already become an irrepressible force. Only by investigating the Hexanexus can you obtain its power to fight Destruction with Destruction...

127030017.text: I think that's a good one

127030018.text: Considering how popular your product has gotten, maybe try to anthropomorphize it

127030019.text: In this fictional city, people live harmoniously with their Hex Maiden. Through solving the Hexanexus, you can deepen the bonds between yourself and your Hex Maiden. What a good life that is

127030020.text: I think that's a good one

127030021.text: Thank you for your help. I will discuss your suggestions with the club members

127030022.text: Anyhow, I'll go back and do some brainstorming, and we will see you again for the next version
